entry.title: Monday night: Rain at times heavy. Low plus 1.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Rain at times heavy beginning early this evening. Fog. Amount 30 mm. Wind northeast 20 km/h gusting to 40. Low plus 1. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EDT Monday 17 April 2023
